string.text: Not sure if I should've offered my help, but I guess I can't back down now. I need to kill these pseudodogs so the loners can advance to the 100 Rads Bar.
Barkeep sent me to his backroom: some Petrenko guy should explain me all this underground labs situation.

A loner by the name of Hunter has been mugged by bandits, and his rifle is now with them. I feel sorry for this poor sobbing bugger so I should go teach the gopniks a lesson and return his beloved rifle.
Petrenko's requesting backup: the Bar is under attack by Mercs. I need to help the survivors defend themselves against the killers.
Comrade General instructed me to meet the scout at lake Yantar. I don't have a right to let down neither of them!
I need to place a bug inside the Freedom bar, steal any intelligence and then bring it back to Comrade General. It doesn't sound easy... but I think I'll handle it.

The squad sent to the Construction Site five days ago has never sent a sitrep ever since. Comrade General surmises it's something about the radio signal but I'm almost sure it's way more deep... Anyway, I should get to those parts and see what's this shit all about.
The Construction Site squad had run into some deep trouble indeed. I need to report on my intervention's results to Comrade General.
So, our faction is having a negotiation with the archenemy - the Sin. There's some negotiator waiting for me at Garbage, and who the hell knows what will he'd ask instead of the information...
Petrenko has decrypted the password for PC located in underground labs: they used an old encryption system, therefore the pass is pretty simple - "top_secret".
